name: desisted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
desist
to stop doing something, especially something that someone else does not want you to do: The soldiers have been ordered to desist from firing their guns. The high winds are expected to desist tomorrow. Synonyms
abstain
refrain formal
